column2: Makes a projectile release damaging sparks as it bounces
Makes a projectile release powerful lightning as it bounces
Makes a projectile remove earth as it bounces
Increases a projectile's duration dramatically but removes all damage & explosion from it
Causes a projectile to be cast from where the caster is standing
A growing orb of positive energy that destroys everything in its reach
Makes a projectile rotate around the caster like an orbiting planet
A glowing hook that pulls the caster towards itself upon collision
Makes a projectile accelerate away from your foes
Summons a large swamp below the caster
Makes a projectile accelerate towards wands
Strange liquid on your clothing is causing you to feel weak.
Casts copies of a projectile in a tetragonal pattern, but the copies still cost mana
Casts a copy of a projectile behind you, but the copy still cost mana
Casts copies of a projectile above and below you, but the copies still cost mana
Casts copies of a projectile in a trifurcated pattern, but the copies still cost mana
Casts a copy of a projectile in a bifurcated pattern, but the copy still cost mana
Casts 5 copies of a projectile in a pentagonal pattern, but the copies still cost mana
Casts 6 copies of a projectile in a hexagonal pattern, but the copies still cost mana
A projectile that at first deals damage, then heals over time
Makes a projectile release a cluster of explosive bolt upon hitting a wall
Releases a spirit that fires copies of a projectile towards targets
Your projectile and explosive resistances increase, but you're easier to hit.
You're harder to hit, but take more projectile and explosive damage.
You take on a hideous new form!
A fast-flying, penetrating lance that glows with power
Target hit by a projectile takes 25% extra projectile damage for a time. Doesn't work on targets immune to projectile damage
Target hit by a projectile takes 25% extra explosion damage for a time. Doesn't work on targets immune to explosive damage
Target hit by a projectile takes 25% extra melee damage for a time. Doesn't work on targets immune to melee damage
Target hit by a projectile takes 25% extra electricity damage for a time. Doesn't work on targets immune to electric damage
You lose 25% maximum health, but can replenish health by drinking blood.\nBlood doesn't affect satiation level and you no longer suffer from food poisoning.
column3: Вы теряете 25% максимального здоровья, но можете восстанавливать ОЗ, выпивая кровь (не влияет на уровень насыщения).
column4: Você perde 25% da vida máxima, mas pode restabelecê-la se beber sangue. O sangue não altera o seu nível de satisfação.
column5: Pierdes un 25 % de tu salud máxima, pero puedes beber sangre para recuperar salud. La sangre no afecta al nivel de saciedad.
column6: Du verlierst 25 % der maximalen Gesundheit, kannst aber die Gesundheit durch das Trinken von Blut wieder auffüllen. Blut beeinflusst den Sättigungsgrad nicht.
column7: Vous perdez 25 % de votre santé max., mais vous pouvez restaurer votre santé en buvant du sang. Le sang n'a aucun effet sur la satiété.
column8: Perdi il 25% della salute massima, ma puoi ripristinarne bevendo sangue. Il sangue non influenza il livello di sazietà.
column9: Tracisz 25% maksymalnego zdrowia, ale odzyskujesz zdrowie, pijąc krew. Krew nie wpływa na poziom nasycenia.
column10: 你丧失 25% 最大生命值，但饮用血液可以补充生命值。血液不会影响饱食度。
column11: 最大HPの25%を失いますが、血を飲むことでHPを補充することができます。血は満腹レベルに影響しません。
column12: 최대 체력의 25%를 상실하지만 피를 마셔 체력을 회복할 수 있습니다. 피는 포만감에 영향을 주지 않습니다.

column2: You have gained a persistent nickname.
Transmutes everything in a short radius into urine, including walls, creatures... and you
Instantly decimates foes around you, at the cost of your HP
An orb of positive energy that destroys everything in its path
A massive orb of positive energy that destroys everything in its reach
